page.title: 14ST.MARY'S HEALTH
page.content: HEALTH On St.Marys we have an old peoples home called park house.there are eight flats and room for 12 people.the oldest person at park house is Mrs. Clark,she is 93. The Dentist on St.Marys is called Mr. Fairest,he works five days a week.He calls the children up from the schools,three time year alphabetical order.Mr.Smith who makes the false teeth etc.The doctors and nurses look at the babies.There are two doctors in the Isles of Scilly called Dr.Davis and Dr.Wooltorton they share their rounds around the Island. They calls at the off Island every week and they go by launch.There is a hospital with a ward for men,women and babies if you are very ill you go to a hospital on the mainland sometimes special doctors come to the Island
